          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Half-life concept</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Halbwertzeitkonzept</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le concept de demi vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conceito do half-life</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έννοια ημιζωής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El concepto del período</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A film which graphically explains the concept of half-life in chemical reactions</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Film, der graphisch das Konzept der 
Halbwertzeit in den chemischen Reaktionen erklärt</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un film qui explique graphiquement le concept de 
la demi vie dans des réactions chimiques</string>
          </description>

          </description>

στις χημικές αντιδράσεις</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una película que explica gráficamente el
